cab.content: isrtv o;nent)ll^^J!fcuiated by the Secretary of State for India. SECRET.From Viceroy, Foreign Department, 31st December-1917.(Received 5 p.m.)Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier quiet. No change in general military situation in Afghanistan or India. 3,024 deserters during November, of whom 1,203 apprehended. .
